mapper.select: SELECT LIPM_INSU_NO POLICY_NO FROM ESERVICE.DBO.LILIPM WHERE UPPER(LIPM_ID) = UPPER(#{rocId}) AND LIPM_INSU_NO = #{policyNo} UNION SELECT LIPI_INSU_NO POLICY_NO FROM ESERVICE.DBO.LILIPI WHERE UPPER(LIPI_ID) = UPPER(#{rocId}) AND LIPI_INSU_NO = #{policyNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ESERVICE.DBO.POLICY_EXTRA WHERE POLICY_NO IN (Select LIPM_ID FROM ESERVICE.DBO.LILIPM WHERE LIPM_ID = #{rocId} ) AND LOAN_AMOUNT > 0
SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),LIPM_BIRTH,111) FROM ESERVICE.DBO.LILIPM WHERE LIPM_INSU_NO = #{policyNo}

SELECT LIPI_ID identityId, PROD.PRODUCT_TYPE, ESERVICE.DBO.FN_DEBASE64(LIPI_NAME) AS insuredName, LIPI_BIRTH birthday FROM ESERVICE.DBO.LILIPI LEFT OUTER JOIN ESERVICE.DBO.PRODUCT PROD ON LIPI_INSU_TYPE = PROD.PRODUCT_CODE WHERE LIPI_INSU_NO = #{policyNo}
